title: TFR Ep. 624: Pearl, Moonage Daydream, 5 Favorite Albums
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt venture back to war time, World War I to be specific, and check in on everyone’s favorite super horny geriatric maniac in her young, formative years.  Ti West and Mia Goth return with ‘Pearl’!  Can a prequel possibly improve upon, or rescue, ‘X’?  Then Matt throws Chris a bone as they discuss the David Bowie Super Documentary, ‘Moonage Daydream’.  Bowie being Chris’ favorite musician, he tends to run super-critical of works associated with The Thin White Duke.  How does this “documentary” turn out.  And why is Chris using “Quotes”?  There’s the life-affirming rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week!  Then Matt and Chris close out the show by sharing their 5 Favorite Albums.  How many Bowie albums will be on Chris’ list?  Will The Return Of Bruno show up?  Will Foreigner Make Matt’s list?  Why does Matt hate Foreigner? And by extension, why does Matt hate Chris? 

00:00-13:00: Intro/Pearl

13:01-29:20: Physical Media Picks/Darkplace

29:21-42:53: Moonage Daydream

42:54-1:17:21: Top 5 Favorite Albums [Currently]

1:17:22-1:18:20: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Scalzo’s Frank Black & The Catholics Mix

Ti West and Mia Goth return with ‘Pearl’!  Can a prequel possibly improve upon, or rescue, ‘X’?  Then Matt throws Chris a bone as they discuss the David Bowie Super Documentary, ‘Moonage Daydream’.  Bowie being Chris’ favorite musician, he tends to run super-critical of works associated with The Thin White Duke.  How does this “documentary” turn out.  And why is Chris using “Quotes”?  There’s the life-affirming rundown of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week!  Then Matt and Chris close out the show by sharing their 5 Favorite Albums.  How many Bowie albums will be on Chris’ list?  Will The Return Of Bruno show up?  Will Foreigner Make Matt’s list?
